question: Which Union Ministry is the organiser of the India Mobile Congress?
explanation:
The India Mobile Congress (IMC) is organised by the Department of Telecommunications, Communication Ministry and the Cellular Operators Association of India (COAI).
Prime Minister Narendra Modi delivered the inaugural address at the Mobile Congress. The event is to be held in virtual mode from December 8 to 10. The theme for IMC 2020 is "Inclusive Innovation - Smart, Secure, Sustainable".
